afkEnd:
Welcome back, I removed your AFK. You have been AFK since {timestamp} (for {formattedTime}).
Your AFK message was: "{message}"

counting.error:
YOU RUINED IT AT {lastNumber}!! This channel's highscore is {channelHighscore}, this guild's highscore is {guildHighscore}.
The next number is **1**.
counting.sameUserTwice: You can't count two numbers in a row!

wordchain.error: YOU RUINED A CHAIN OF {count} WORDS AT "{lastChar}"!! Restart by writing any word.
wordchain.inALoop: Why are you going in a circle?! That word was only used recently!
wordchain.sameUserTwice: You can't say two words in a row!
wordchain.wrongChar: Can't you read?! That word doesn't start with the last word's character.
